item.title: Introduction to Ansible
item.description: Imagine you got a task to execute several commands or maybe a bunch of steps to configure something in your servers. For example; updating your Ubuntu, then add some HTML page, then install Nginx, then change its config, and then restart the Nginx service. Itâ€™ll be okay if only have one or two servers. But what if you have ten servers? even maybe 15? 20? Trust me, it will hurt your back if you handle it one by one manually.
